title: Where are the options to change volume in new client?
body: I really, really do not want ambient sounds of wind/music whenever I have league booted.

replies.body: Do you mean the sounds on the login screen?  There are a few toggle boxes on the bottom left to disable login music.  You can also select which tunes you want to hear on the client in the Sound pane of your client settings after logging in.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Click the cog to the right corner of the client, looks for "Sounds.
